mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.fuzhuang_order_uuid_number as fuzhuangOrderUuidNumber ,a.address_id as addressId ,a.fuzhuang_id as fuzhuangId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.buy_number as buyNumber ,a.fuzhuang_order_true_price as fuzhuangOrderTruePrice ,a.fuzhuang_order_courier_name as fuzhuangOrderCourierName ,a.fuzhuang_order_courier_number as fuzhuangOrderCourierNumber ,a.fuzhuang_order_types as fuzhuangOrderTypes ,a.fuzhuang_order_payment_types as fuzhuangOrderPaymentTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
